P

Pet - Class in model
Instances of this class represent a pet.
Pet(String, Species, ToyType, FoodType) - Constructor for class model.Pet
Initialises all variables used by a pet instance.
Pet(String, Species, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, int, int, int, int, int, ToyType, FoodType) - Constructor for class model.Pet
Sets all variables used by a pet instance - this overloaded constructor should be used when loading from a saved game.
PetInteract - Class in gui
Displays pet statistics and allows the player to interact with the pet.
PetInteract(Font, Font) - Constructor for class gui.PetInteract
Create the panel - initialise all components but do not set values until setPet is called.
PetSetup - Class in gui
Allows the user to set the name and species of a single pet, and generate the pet.
PetSetup(Species[], String[], ToyType[], FoodType[], Font, Font, int) - Constructor for class gui.PetSetup
Create the panel - a labelled text field for the name and a labelled combo box to choose a species from.
PetSetupTest - Class in unittests
Tests that the PetSetup GUI component can correctly generate a new pet based on its fields and inputs.
PetSetupTest() - Constructor for class unittests.PetSetupTest
 
PetStatDisplayer - Class in gui
A view only slider that displays information about a pet's attribute.
PetStatDisplayer(Font, Font, String, ImageIcon, String, Color, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class gui.PetStatDisplayer
Create the panel - a view only slider that displays information about a pet's attribute to a player.
PetTab - Class in gui
A clickable tab which will switch the selected pet to the pet represented in this tab, the tab also displays status effects and action points of the pet.
PetTab(Font) - Constructor for class gui.PetTab
Create the pet tab panel - the button, the status overlays, the name/action points labels, and the pet's icon.
PetTest - Class in unittests
Tests the non-getter/setter methods of pet: eat, play, toilet, sleep, cure, discipline, revive, and end turn.
PetTest() - Constructor for class unittests.PetTest
 
play(Toy) - Method in class model.Pet
Makes the pet play with a toy.
Player - Class in model
A class for storing players and executing their interactions with pets.
Player(String, Pet[], int) - Constructor for class model.Player
Initialises a new Player instance with the given name and array of pets.
Player(String, Pet[], HashMap<FoodType, Integer>, ArrayList<Toy>, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Player
Creates a new Player instance with the given properties.
PlayerSetup - Class in gui
Allows the user to set up a player, giving it a name and pets.
PlayerSetup(Species[], String[], ToyType[], FoodType[], Font, Font, int) - Constructor for class gui.PlayerSetup
Create the panel - a name entry field, a number of pets spinner, and PetSetups.
PlayerSetupTest - Class in unittests
Tests that the PlayerSetup GUI component can correctly generate a new player based on its fields and inputs.
PlayerSetupTest() - Constructor for class unittests.PlayerSetupTest
 
PlayerTest - Class in unittests
Tests the non-getter/setter methods of Player: addFood, addToy, feed, playWith.
PlayerTest() - Constructor for class unittests.PlayerTest
 
playWith(Pet, Toy) - Method in class model.Player
The player plays with a pet using a toy.
